subjective: Patient reports feeling congested and tired for the last few days, with a dry cough and sore throat since Monday.
objective: Throat looks slightly red, temperature is normal at 98.6°F, lungs are clear on auscultation.
assessment: likely a viral upper respiratory infection
plan: Continue taking Tylenol as needed, rest, drink fluids, and call back if things don’t improve within a week; no antibiotics for now.
